text: Muhammad az-Zaruq Rajab () (born 7 March 1940)محمد الزروق رجب is a Libyan politician. Rajab was General Secretary of the General People's Congress from January 7, 1981 to February 15, 1984. From 16 February 1984 to 3 March 1986 he was the Prime Minister of Libya. ==References== Category:Prime ministers of Libya Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Heads of state of Libya
title: Muhammad az-Zaruq Rajab
